TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XhtmlTextWriter extends System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter

summary.span: 將可延伸超文字標記語言 (XHTML) 特定字元 (包括衍生自 XTHML 的 XHTML 模組所有變異) 寫入至 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的輸出資料流，供行動裝置使用。

span.span: Writes Extensible Hypertext Markup Language (XHTML)-specific characters, including all variations of XHTML modules that derive from XTHML, to the output stream for an ASP.NET server control for mobile devices.

summary.span: 請覆寫 類別，為 ASP.NET 網頁和伺服器控制項提供自訂 XHTML 呈現。

span.span: Override the class to provide custom XHTML rendering for ASP.NET pages and server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XHTML 是 XML 相容的標記語言，根據 HTML 4.1，可讓您建立適用於多個裝置類型的網站。XHTML is an XML-compliant markup language, based on HTML 4.1, which allows you to create Web sites that are suitable for multiple device types. 它會合併易於使用 HTML 所提供的 XML，才能產生各種不同的格式和樣式選項與降低的標記標記模稜兩可的標記語言提供的嚴格的項目指導方針。It merges the ease of use provided by HTML with the strict element guidelines provided by XML to produce a markup language with a wide range of format and style options, and with reduced markup tag ambiguity. 類別提供給用戶端轉譯 XHTML 內容時，ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用的格式化功能。The class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering XHTML content to clients. 您可以使用方法，以指定的 XHTML 類型的文字寫入器會轉譯。You can use the method to specify which type of XHTML the text writer renders. 支援的文件類型定義於列舉型別。Supported document types are defined in the enumeration. 類別會呈現兩個集合的項目屬性。The class renders two sets of attributes for elements. 一組是通用的屬性，所參考的集合屬性。One set is a collection of common attributes, as referenced in the property. 第二個集合是所參考的項目特定屬性的集合屬性。The second set is a collection of element-specific attributes, as referenced in the property. 如需有關的項目和呈現的樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱 XHTML 模組規格的[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on the elements and styles that are rendered, see the XHTML modularization specification at the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 您可以使用的成員類別和任何衍生的類別來建立自訂的文字寫入器，用於自訂的 XHTML 頁面配接器或類別介面卡。You can use the members of the class and any derived classes to create custom text writers to use in custom XHTML page adapters or class adapters. 您也可以建立衍生的類別覆寫的標準行為類別。You can also create derived classes that override the standard behavior of the class. 根據預設，當您使用瀏覽器支援 HTML 4.0 的 ASP.NET 網頁及控制項呈現標記的 XHTML 1.1 標準與相容。By default, when you are working with browsers that support HTML 4.0, ASP.NET pages and controls render markup that is compatible with the XHTML 1.1 standard. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). 輸出 XHTML，除非您將設定為不會呈現 XHTML 標記的 ASP.NET。The outputs XHTML unless you configure ASP.NET specifically to not render XHTML markup. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 設定 XHTML 呈現在 ASP.NET 網站](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149)。For more information, see [NIB: How to: Configure XHTML Rendering in ASP.NET Web Sites](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42483a54-f1ae-44e1-88e6-4370f8690149). ## Examples 在本節中的程式碼範例包含四個部分。The code example in this section contains four parts. 第一個範例示範如何建立衍生的類別。The first example demonstrates how to create a derived class. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂控制項。The second code example demonstrates how to create a custom control. 第三個程式碼範例示範如何使用自訂控制項。The third code example demonstrates how to use the custom control. 第四個程式碼範例提供需要執行自訂控制項的程式碼。The fourth code example provides the code that is required to run the custom control. 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂的類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom class that is derived from the class. 它有兩個建構函式，這是標準的所有直接或間接繼承自的類別類別。It has two constructors, which is standard for all classes that inherit directly or indirectly from the class. 第一個建構函式接受物件做為參數，並傳遞下列兩個參數值的第二個建構函式的呼叫：The first constructor takes a object as a parameter and calls the second constructor, passing the following two parameter values: - 執行個體。The instance. - 值屬性，定義預設列縮排，以供 XHTML 文字寫入器。The value of the property, which defines the default line indentation that is used by the XHTML text writer. 這個程式碼範例也示範如何覆寫和方法，以篩選文字的大小和色彩樣式，分別。This code example also shows how to override the and methods to filter for text size and color style, respectively. 此外，它會覆寫和之前和之後，要呈現控制項具有字串以寫入文字的方法。Additionally, it overrides the and methods to write a text string before and after a control has rendered. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/CS/customxhtmltextwriter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/VB/customxhtmltextwriter.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂控制項，名為`TestLabel`和名為自訂配接器`XhtmlTestLabelAdapter`呈現為 XHTML 控制項的內容。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control named `TestLabel` and a custom adapter named `XhtmlTestLabelAdapter` that renders the content of the control as XHTML. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/xhtmltextlabel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/xhtmltestlabel.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用自訂控制項`TestLabel`ASP.NET 網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to use the custom control `TestLabel` on an ASP.NET Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/xhtmltextlabel.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/xhtmltestlabel.aspx#4)] 若要使用自訂控制項，在上述程式碼範例中，加入下列``兩個檔案的其中一個項目。To use the custom control in the preceding code example, add the following `` element to one of two files. 您可以將它加入適當全機器的檔案的子目錄中針對特定的瀏覽器中，為的子資料夾的.NET Framework 組態目錄。You can add it to the appropriate machine-wide file in the subdirectory for a specific browser, as a subfolder of the .NET Framework configuration directory. 或者，您可以將它加入 App_Browsers 底下的目錄中的 Web 應用程式根目錄的自訂瀏覽器檔案。Alternatively, you can add it to a custom browser file in the App_Browsers directory under the Web application root. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式物件參數呼叫傳遞兩個參數值的第二個建構函式：The constructor that takes a object as a parameter calls the second constructor, passing two parameter values: - 執行個體。The instance. - 中指定的字串值欄位中，它會定義可由 XHTML 文字寫入器的索引標籤間距。The string value that is specified in the field, which defines the tab spacing that is used by the XHTML text writer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立兩個建構函式的所有類別直接或間接衍生自標準類別，可用於自訂的類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create the two constructors, which is standard for all classes that derive directly or indirectly from the class, for a custom class that is derived from the class. summary.span: 將屬性加入至 XHTML 項目。

span.span: Adds an attribute to an XHTML element.

summary.span: 物件的項目特定屬性集合是由 屬性所參考。

span.span: The collection of element-specific attributes for the object is referenced by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，將屬性加入至 XHTML 項目。Use the method to add an attribute to an XHTML element. 加入的屬性可以再辨識及所呈現物件。The added attribute can then be recognized and rendered by the object. 若要避免寫入器會轉譯 XHTML 項目的一般屬性，請使用方法。To prevent the writer from rendering a common attribute of an XHTML element, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合包含的屬性 XHTML 項目中允許和不會隱藏在屬性。The collection contains attributes that are allowed in XHTML elements and that are not suppressed in the property. 如需通用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on common attributes, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 新執行個體時類別建立、 初始化的通用屬性包括：When a new instance of the class is created, the common attributes that are initialized are: - `class` - `id` - `title` - `xml:lang`

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用XHTML 項目屬性的方法，將可辨識。Use the method to add recognized attributes to an XHTML element. 若要移除 XHTML 項目上的通用屬性，請使用方法。To remove common attributes on an XHTML element, use the method. 新執行個體時類別，建立的項目特定屬性的物件會填入下列表格中所顯示的屬性。When a new instance of the class is created, the object of element-specific attributes is populated with the attributes shown in the following table. |元素Element|屬性Attributes| |-------------|----------------| |``|`accesskey`, `href`, `charset`, `hreflang`, `rel`, `type`, `rev`, `title`, `tabindex``accesskey`, `href`, `charset`, `hreflang`, `rel`, `type`, `rev`, `title`, `tabindex`| |``|`href`| |`
`|`cite`| |`
`|`id`, `class`, `title``id`, `class`, `title`| |`
`|`action`, `method`, `enctype``action`, `method`, `enctype`| |``|`xml:lang`| |``|`version`, `xml:lang`, `xmlns``version`, `xml:lang`, `xmlns`| |``|`src`, `alt`, `width`, `longdesc`, `height``src`, `alt`, `width`, `longdesc`, `height`| |``|`size`, `accesskey`, `title`, `name`, `type`, `disabled`, `value`, `src`, `checked`, `maxlength`, `tabindex``size`, `accesskey`, `title`, `name`, `type`, `disabled`, `value`, `src`, `checked`, `maxlength`, `tabindex`| |`

summary.span: 檢查 XHTML 屬性，確定該屬性可以呈現在 項目的開頭標記中。

span.span: Checks an XHTML attribute to ensure that it can be rendered in the opening tag of a element.

returns.span: 如果屬性可以套用至 項目則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the attribute can be applied to a element; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法相當實用，有條件地呈現根據是否支援所要求的裝置的 XHTML 文件類型的屬性。This method is useful to conditionally render an attribute depending on whether it is supported by the XHTML document type of the requesting device. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立自訂之較大範例的一部分控制項和配接器，會呈現為 XHTML 控制項的內容。The following code example is part of a larger example that creates a custom control and an adapter that renders the content of the control as XHTML. 這個程式碼範例示範如何建立名為的布林值變數`attTest`並將它設定為傳回值所產生的呼叫以參數值"style"的方法。This code example demonstrates how to create a Boolean variable named `attTest` and set it to the return value that results from calling the method with the parameter value "style". 如果方法會傳回`true`，使用轉譯與控制項相關聯的樣式和方法。If the method returns `true`, the styles that are associated with the control are rendered using the and methods. 如果`attTest`值是`false`，不會轉譯樣式。If the `attTest` value is `false`, the styles are not rendered. 相反地，頁面會顯示控制項的文字`
`所呈現的項目方法，並通知使用者有條件地呈現控制項的 XHTML 內容的文字字串。Instead, the page displays the text for the control, a `
` element that is rendered by the method, and a text string informing the user that the XHTML content of the control has rendered conditionally. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/xhtmltextlabel.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/xhtmltestlabel.vb#3)]

summary.span: 判斷指定的 XHTML 屬性以及該屬性的值是否可以在目前的標記項目中呈現。

span.span: Determines whether the specified XHTML attribute and its value can be rendered to the current markup element.

returns.span: 如果屬性會在網頁上呈現，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the attribute is rendered to the page; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法來檢查是否`size`屬性會呈現任何此文字寫入器所呈現的項目。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to check whether a `size` attribute is rendered for any of the elements that are rendered by this text writer. 如果`size`屬性呈現、 程式碼會檢查它的值是否為 8 點。If a `size` attribute is rendered, the code checks whether its value is 8 point. 如果是這樣，方法會傳回`true`，允許的屬性和它的值來呈現。If so, the method returns `true`, allowing the attribute and its value to render. 如果值為 8 的點以外方法會傳回`false`，並不會轉譯屬性和其值。If the value is other than 8 point, the method returns `false`, and the attribute and its value are not rendered. 如果索引鍵參數方法不符合屬性，基底功能呼叫方法，如中所定義類別。If the key parameter of the method does not match the attribute, the base functionality of the method is called, as defined in the class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/CS/customxhtmltextwriter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/VB/customxhtmltextwriter.vb#2)]

returns.span: 如果呈現樣式屬性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the style attribute is rendered; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法來檢查是否屬性所呈現的任何此文字寫入器所呈現項目。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to check whether a attribute is being rendered for any of the elements that are rendered by this text writer. 如果屬性呈現、 程式碼會檢查它的值是否為紫色。If a attribute is rendered, the code checks whether its value is purple. 如果值為紫色，方法會傳回`false`並不會轉譯屬性和其值。If the value is purple, the method returns `false` and the attribute and its value are not rendered. 如果屬性設定為任何其他值：方法會傳回`true`和呈現的屬性和其值。If the attribute is set to any other value, the method returns `true` and the attribute and its value are rendered. 如果索引鍵參數方法不符合屬性，基底功能呼叫方法，如中所定義類別。If the key parameter of the method does not match the attribute, the base functionality of the method is called, as defined in the class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/CS/customxhtmltextwriter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.XhtmlTextWriter_Sample2#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.xhtmltextwriter_Sample2/VB/customxhtmltextwriter.vb#3)]

span.span: Specifies the XHTML document type for the text writer to render to the page or control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用自訂頁面配置器來定義您想要呈現給提出要求的裝置的 XHTML 類型中的方法。Use the method in a custom page adapter to define the type of XHTML that you want to render to the requesting device. 支援的文件類型定義於列舉型別。Supported document types are defined in the enumeration.

span.span: A of elements containing a collection of that are not rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隱藏的屬性集合，包含 XHTML 項目清單屬性不會轉譯。The suppressed attribute collection includes a list of XHTML elements for which attributes are not rendered. 新執行個體時類別，建立物件的項目，其會隱藏屬性包括：When a new instance of the class is created, the object of elements for which attributes are suppressed includes: - `base` - `meta` - `br` - `head` - `title` - `html` - `style`
